resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107372</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107372</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770200744</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Build a Bridge</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bauen Sie eine Brücke auf</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Construisez une passerelle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Construa uma ponte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Costruisca un ponticello</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χτίστε μια γέφυρα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Construya un puente</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Survey potential bridge sites, research bridge design, and select the right bridge for the right location in this interactive activity from the NOVA Web site.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Überblicken Sie mögliche Brücke Sites, 
erforschen Sie Brücke Design und wählen Sie die rechte Brücke für 
den rechten Standort in dieser interaktiven Aktivität von der NOVA 
Web site aus.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Examinez les sites potentiels de passerelle, 
recherchez la conception de passerelle, et choisissez la passerelle 
droite pour le bon emplacement dans cette activité interactive à 
partir du site de Web de NOVA.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Examine locais potenciais da ponte, pesquise o 
projeto da ponte, e selecione a ponte direita para a posição direita
nesta atividade interativa do Web site do NOVA.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esamini i luoghi potenziali del ponticello, 
ricerchi il disegno del ponticello e selezioni il ponticello di destra
per la giusta posizione in questa attività interattiva a partire dal 
Web site del NOVA.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ερευνήστε τις πιθανές περιοχές γεφυρών, σχέδιο 
ερευνητικών γεφυρών, και επιλέξτε τη σωστή γέφυρα για τη σωστή 
θέση σε αυτήν την διαλογική δραστηριότητα από τον ιστοχώρο 
NOVA.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Examine los sitios potenciales del puente, 
investigue el diseño del puente, y seleccione el puente derecho para 
la localización derecha en esta actividad interactiva del sitio del 
Web de la NOVA.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:WGBH EDUCATIONAL FOUNDATION
FN:WGBH EDUCATIONAL FOUNDATION
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770200744</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107372</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/build-a-bridge</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
